March gains: 60%  🎯 
 
April gains: 56%  🎯 
 
May gains: 87%  🎯

Overall not the best Month for me so far. Half way into June I was down over 10% on my account. Since then I recovered 20%. So as of today I’m up about 10% for this month. Not bad considering the overall market has remained relatively even this month (DOW down 2% and Nasdaq up 2%).

Prpo, some bios and covid related stocks should hold up ok but everything not covid was awful ( I didn’t look at everything lol). The major averages are touching key support levels now. If these levels are broken the markets may get very ugly. I hope we get improvement next week but covid cases are spiking. Texas here are am, sent an alert tonight to stay in your house. It’s at the highest emergency level Red (seems like a serous color). I sold my Bank stocks, Airline and TD ameritrade stocks. I had some profit but didn’t want to take a chance on having it all evaporate and then go into a loss. Cash gives me powder if market corrects. Hope I am wrong, but my plan is to protect cash, as I stated in prior posts. The stocks I sold didn’t move much anyway and weren’t worth the market risk.  Devise a plan to protect cash this weekend in case a major correction is beginning. JMO
